channel.title: Qubes R3/Odyssey initial source code release
channel.description:
FYI:
The Qubes Team has now released the initial source code for their new R3/Odyssey version of Qubes.
This is primarily a notice to developers, since Qubes users are still advised to use the existing Qubes R2 version.
http://theinvisiblethings.blogspot.com/2014/11/qubes-r3odyssey-initial-source-code.html
Current Qubes + Whonix users do not need to do anything with this. Just sharing information.
Congrats to the entire Qubes Team! :D

item.title: Qubes R3/Odyssey initial source code release
item.dc:creator: WhonixQubes
item.description:
FYI:

The Qubes Team has now released the initial source code for their new R3/Odyssey version of Qubes.

This is primarily a notice to developers, since Qubes users are still advised to use the existing Qubes R2 version.

theinvisiblethings.blogspot.com

Qubes R3/Odyssey initial source code release

Back in 2013 we've started the work on generalizing Qubes architecture, which we code-named “Odyssey”, to allow for use of multiple hypervis...

Current Qubes + Whonix users do not need to do anything with this. Just sharing information.

Congrats to the entire Qubes Team!

Read full topic
item.source: Qubes R3/Odyssey initial source code release
